creator: Better days - Relaxing puzzles
descriptionHtml:
Tilescapes is a challenging tile matching game. There are tons of chanllenging and well-designed levels to train your logic and memory. It is the best time killer for you!

HOW TO PLAY?
- The goal of the game is to clear all the tiles from the puzzle board by clicking three of same tiles.

- Complete different levels, unlock different skins.

FEATURES
- Easy & fun matching game mechanics.
- Inspired by the classic Mahjong game, and also we introduce a brand new mechanic.
- Use powerups to overcome the difficulty.

Amazing and unique art design
- All tiles are 3D modeling pictures.
- We have tons of amazing themes.

Why play Tilescapes?
- Play free puzzle offline.
- The game is very relaxing.You can play at your own pace.
- No time limit, no pressure!

title: Tile Journey - Classic Puzzle

creator: Better days - Relaxing puzzles
descriptionHtml:
Tile Journey is a challenging tile matching puzzle game with tons of exciting and well-designed levels to train your logic and memory. Match 3 tiles, complete different levels and unlock new skins. This is going to be the best time killer for you but beware - it’s addictive!

How To Play a Tile Puzzle？
The goal of the game is to clear all the magic tiles from the puzzle board by clicking three identical tiles.

Main Features or why you will enjoy this tile matching game: 

Simple & Fun Matching Game Mechanics
This is a relaxing journey where you match 3 tiles that look identical. Improve your performance and reach new levels! The game is easy to play but it stays challenging. Train memory and test your logic!

Inspired by the Classic Mahjong Game
While you continue matching tiles, we introduce a brand new mechanic to spice it up. Tile Journey gets more challenging gradually - the hardest part is ahead!

Overcome Obstacles
We made sure this isn’t just a monotonic antistress tap but an actual match brain game. Focus on the tile board and don’t miss the chance to connect 3 tiles. This game can be an excellent eye and hand coordination exercise if you continue playing.

Amazing and Unique Art Design
It’s not just classic three tile images but 3D tiles that are made as modeling pictures. We have tons of amazing themes and impressive gaming art. Enjoy beautiful backgrounds and advanced graphics while playing.

No Time Pressure
Enjoy the fun without the pressure of being timed. Find your triple match and enjoy the logic game without a limit. Calm music helps relaxing and releasing stress while keeping your brain awake.

Available Offline
Searching for an offline tile game? Here you go! This tile crush match 3 game is going to stay with you anywhere at any time, with or without Internet. Become the master of this amazing 3d tile puzzle!
descriptionShort: Classic tile matching board game, reinvented. Match 3 tiles, relax and have fun!
